backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, events, chat, authorization, approvals, and related state with helper validation and access checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the admin-only Profile Management navigation entry and associated file references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme configuration defining light and dark mode variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React frontend via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/frontend-build-check.sh: Shell script performing TypeScript checks and a Vite production build to validate frontend health.
frontend/scripts/README.md: Documentation explaining frontend build verification scripts and usage.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and renders the application inside the AppShell layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChatModera: Admin panel for listing, approving, and removing chat messages with mutation hooks and UI controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/EventsMana: Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting events using associated React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileVal: Lists public profiles and lets admins toggle validation status with mutation calls and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/PublicProf: Provides a form for admins to select and edit public profile fields and submit updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/Statistics: Displays admin statistics such as totals for users, messages, events, and points in card widgets.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login and logout flows with UI feedback and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Blocks access to children unless the caller is an admin, showing an access‑denied card otherwise.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Redirects unauthenticated users to home and shows a sign‑in prompt until authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireOnbo: Redirects authenticated users without completed onboarding to the onboarding page and blocks content until loaded.
Provides a button to vote on chat messages, triggering a vote mutation and toast responses.
frontend/src/components/landing/Sponsors: Shows a grid of sponsor cards with links to their external websites.
Renders the main navigation shell with dynamic menus based on auth, onboarding, and admin status.
frontend/src/components/system/Initializ: Displays initialization slow/error states and offers retry or reload actions based on actor, auth, and profile status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides hooks to check admin status and fetch system statistics using the safe actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Returns authentication state including principal, identity, and login status from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Provides chat message queries and mutations, auto-refetching and invalidating related message and profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the caller's private user profile with graceful handling of authorization-related null states.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvents.ts: Exposes event listing, details, and CRUD/RSVP mutations with appropriate query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializationWatc: Detects slow or failed auth, actor creation, and profile loading, returning flags for initialization status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: Fetches the leaderboard of principals and scores using the safe actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicProfiles.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and validating public profiles using a backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutation hooks for user registration, onboarding completion, and saving private user profiles, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates and returns a backend actor tied to the user's identity with safe initialization and caching via React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Imports global stylesheet from the parent directory.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabbed navigation for stats, profile management, events, and chat moderation.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Displays a community chat interface allowing authenticated users to post messages and view the approved message feed.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityDirectoryPag: Shows a grid-style directory of public profiles with loading states and links to individual profile pages.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailPage.tsx: Displays event details, participation stats, and allows authenticated users to RSVP to an event.
frontend/src/pages/EventsListPage.tsx: Displays a list of community events with loading and empty states, requiring authentication and onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page showing features and sponsors, redirecting authenticated users based on onboarding status.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows a ranked leaderboard of users by points with icons for top ranks, gated by auth and onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Allows users to view and edit their private profile, handling onboarding prompts, loading, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Guides authenticated users through registration and onboarding steps with profile checks and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/PartnersPage.tsx: Displays partner organizations with logos, descriptions, and external links.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Renders a public profile page that loads a user profile, shows validation status, biography, services, and social links, and wraps content with auth and onboarding requirements.
frontend/src/utils/linkParsing.ts: Provides helpers to validate URLs, extract them from text, and generate display labels based on domain names.
frontend/src/utils/profileDisplay.ts: Generates profile display strings including name, initial, and secondary text based on available profile fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, radius, fonts, and animations while enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node‑side tooling with ESNext modules and bundler resolution, targeting vite.config.ts.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, environment variable injection, path aliases, chunk splitting, API proxying, and build settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including version, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features for the NG COIN app.
